text: Lucy Mary Cavanagh (1871–1936) was an American botanist and plant collector, noted for her identification of several species of bryophytes. == Works == * * == References == Category:1871 births Category:1936 deaths Category:19th- century American botanists Category:19th-century American women scientists Category:20th-century American botanists Category:20th-century American women scientists
title: Lucy Mary Cavanagh
